forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of light rain this morning. High 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of rain this morning. High 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early then becoming windy with periods of rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early then becoming windy with rain developing later in the day. High 52F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers following a period of rain and wind early. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers following a period of rain and wind early. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 47F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.
